name: MoveItUp Demo
description:
MOVE IT UP V 1.1 brings a unique rhythm game experience

Random Level generator: Tired of fixed level challenge? Here we provide a brand-new random level generator in 2 new game modes. Every time is a new and unexpected challenge that will never be repeated.
Battle Mode: Who is the best? Let's just battle then we will know. Attack & defense each other during the battle to conquer your opponents.
The full version provides 12 tracks with diverse styles and various gameplays, including "survival mode", "solo mode" and "campaign mode".
